name: SpaceBrigadeM1
description:
Space Brigade is a 3rd person shooter space battle game in which the player commandeers a space ship. The player must survive by shooting and destroying enemy ships to continue their journey through space. Currently, there is only a starter level where the enemies do not attack to help the player learn the controls.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move the ship around

Enter key - Accelerate

Space bar - Shoot
